original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, posts as p, postLinks as pl, postHistory as ph, votes as v, badges as b, users as u WHERE p.Id = pl.RelatedPostId AND b.UserId = u.Id AND c.UserId = u.Id AND p.Id = v.PostId AND p.Id = c.PostId AND p.Id = ph.PostId AND c.Score=0 AND p.ViewCount>=0 AND p.AnswerCount<=5 AND p.CommentCount<=12 AND p.FavoriteCount>=0 AND pl.LinkTypeId=1 AND pl.CreationDate>=CAST('2011-02-16 20:04:50' AS TIMESTAMP) AND pl.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-01 16:48:04' AS TIMESTAMP) AND v.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-07-19 00:00:00' AS TIMESTAMP) AND v.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-08-31 00:00:00' AS TIMESTAMP) AND b.Date>=CAST('2010-08-06 10:36:45' AS TIMESTAMP) AND b.Date<=CAST('2014-09-12 07:19:35' AS TIMESTAMP)
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments WHERE comments.Score = 0
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts WHERE posts.ViewCount >= 0 AND posts.AnswerCount <= 5 AND posts.CommentCount <= 12 AND posts.FavoriteCount >= 0
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2 AS SELECT * FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E1.PostId=E2.Id)
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E4 AS SELECT * FROM E1E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E1E2.PostId=E4.PostId)

CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM postLinks AS postLinks WHERE postLinks.LinkTypeId = 1 AND (CAST(postLinks.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2011-02-16 20:04:50' AND CAST(postLinks.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-01 16:48:04')
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E4E3 AS SELECT * FROM E1E2E4 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E1E2E4.PostId=E3.RelatedPostId)

CREATE VIEW E5 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes WHERE CAST(votes.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-19 00:00:00' AND CAST(votes.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-08-31 00:00:00'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E4E3E5 AS SELECT * FROM E1E2E4E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E5 WHERE E1E2E4E3.PostId=E5.PostId)
CREATE VIEW E6 AS SELECT * FROM badges AS badges WHERE CAST(badges.Date AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-08-06 10:36:45' AND CAST(badges.Date AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-12 07:19:35'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E4E3E5E6 AS SELECT * FROM E1E2E4E3E5 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E6 WHERE E1E2E4E3E5.UserId=E6.UserId)
CREATE VIEW E7 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E4E3E5E6E7 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1E2E4E3E5E6 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E7 WHERE E1E2E4E3E5E6.UserId=E7.Id)
